wiki.content:
Cold" is the first single released by the post-grunge/hard rock band Crossfade. It was the lead single released from their debut full-length self-titled album Crossfade in 2004. The single was also released in 2004. It fared exceptionally well on rock charts worldwide and is their biggest hit to date, reaching #81 on the U.S. Hot 100, #3 on the U.S. Mainstream Rock Tracks, and #2 on the U.S. Modern Rock Tracks, as well as reaching #41 on the UK Singles Chart.
 
 The song is about a man who was unintentionally mean or cold-hearted to a loved one in the past, and now he is apologizing to the person. The person he is apologizing to has been polite and caring to him, so this must be the reason why he is saying sorry about the way he treated that someone.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Cold" is the first single released by the post-grunge/hard rock band Crossfade. It was the lead single released from their debut full-length self-titled album Crossfade in 2004. The single was also released in 2004. It fared exceptionally well on rock charts worldwide and is their biggest hit to date, reaching #81 on the U.S. Hot 100, #3 on the U.S. Mainstream Rock Tracks, and #2 on the U.S. Modern Rock Tracks, as well as reaching #41 on the UK Singles Chart.

track.name: Cold
comments: Kinda' rings true with me at the moment.
What I really meant to say is I'm sorry for the way I am...never meant to be so cold....
Never meant to be... so... cooooooooold
I'm sorry for the way I am.... Never meant to be so cold.
Have been listening to this song for years still love it
